## PropertyPropertyWidgetComponentComboBox interface

Combobox component for [PropertyPropertyWidgetComponent](./obsidian-typings.propertypropertywidgetcomponent.md)<!-- -->.

**Signature:**

```typescript
export interface PropertyPropertyWidgetComponentComboBox
    extends PopoverSuggest<PropertyPropertyWidgetComponentComboBoxItem>
```

**Extends:** PopoverSuggest&lt;[PropertyPropertyWidgetComponentComboBoxItem](./obsidian-typings.propertypropertywidgetcomponentcomboboxitem.md)<!-- -->&gt;
